comment._content: Andrew Sockalexis was a sprinter in the Olympics and was a Native American. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C01E6DE103FE633A... A link about his wedding.

comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: American athlete Thomas Lilley (1887-1954) finished 18th in the marathon at the 1912 Olympics. Thomas H. Lilley at Sports Reference. His fellow Olympic marathoner (who took 4th place) Andrew Sockalexis (1891-1919) has a Wikipedia page.
